title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. II, subch. A, pt. 4607 - Games Of Chance Supplier: Application And Licensing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. II, subch. A, pt. 4607 - Games Of Chance Supplier: Application And Licensing

State Regulations
§ 4607.1 - License required
§ 4607.2 - Form for application
§ 4607.3 - Individual and business entity statement
§ 4607.4 - Corporation statement
§ 4607.5 - List of employees, agents or representatives
§ 4607.6 - Requisites for license
§ 4607.7 - Hearings
§ 4607.8 - Issuance by commission
§ 4607.9 - When fees shall be payable
§ 4607.10 - Ineligibility for a license
§ 4607.11 - Disapproval procedure
§ 4607.12 - Grounds for revocation or suspension
§ 4607.13 - Persons prohibited from participating in the conduct of games of chance
§ 4607.14 - Games of chance supplier to notify commission of all changes in structure
§ 4607.15 - Maintenance of books and records
§ 4607.17 - [Repealed]
§ 4607.16 - Sales to other than licensed organizations or lessors prohibited
§ 4607.18 - Examination of records
§ 4607.19 - Time during which license is effective
§ 4607.20 - License form
§ 4607.21 - Recapitulation of fees
§ 4607.22 - Identification of games of chance devices and equipment
§ 4607.23 - Specifications of games of chance equipment and supplies
§ 4607.24 - Maintenance to be licensed activity
§ 4607.25 - No separate fee to be charged by supplier
§ 4607.26 - Supplier's gifts or donations prohibited
§ 4607.28 - [Repealed]
§ 4607.27 - Leasing of games of chance equipment from any unlicensed person prohibited
§ 4607.29 - Temporary permit

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. II, subch. A, pt. 4607

Amended

New

York State Register July 20, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 29, eff. 7/20/2022

Statutory authority: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and

Breeding Law, §§101, 104[1], [19], 128; Executive Law, art. 19-B, § 435; General Municipal Law, arts. 9-A, 14-H, §§ 186, 188-a; L. 1976, ch. 960

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
